review:
I recently visited Dr. Kavitha for a teeth cleaning and was thoroughly impressed .

Dr. Kavitha herself was professional, gentle, and thorough. She explained each step of the procedure clearly and made sure I was comfortable throughout the appointment. The teeth cleaning itself was painless and efficient, and I left feeling fresh and confident with my clean teeth.

What stood out to me was Dr. Kavitha's attention to detail - she pointed out some areas that needed extra attention and took the time to explain how to improve my oral hygiene at home.

Overall, I would highly recommend Dr. Kavitha and her clinic to anyone looking for a dentist *** ** ************** gentle, and caring.

Dr. Kavitha Valathi is exceptional! I recently had a root canal treatment done by her, and I couldn't be more impressed. Not only was the procedure painless, but it was also surprisingly quick. Dr. Kavitha's expertise and gentle approach truly made the experience seamless. I highly recommend her for anyone in need of dental care.

I can recommend Dr Kavitha. I am very happy with the care and patience shown with my dental checkup, Very professional dentist, super helpful .

Thank you Dr Kavitha

Dr. Kavitha is a wonderful dentist. She *** **** *** ********* *** expertise but also makes patients feel comfortable and relaxed throughout. I would highly recommed Dr. Kavitha for any dental problems you might be facing.

I got my root canal treatment done from Dr Kavitha Valathi. 
The treatment was painless and the doctor was courteous towards me. 
Recommend Dr Kavitha for your dental treatment.
